title: BUG WITH NEW CHAMP: KLED
body: I have experienced a bug while playing kled. When kledd loses skaarl he can get him back from killing minnions, attacking a champion, or hitting a turret. The bug that i had severous times is that when i lose skaarl i begin to attack a hamp to outplay and get skaarl back buut the rage bar doesnt do anything. It stays at 0 and i get killed. so please riot fix this bug so we all can enjoy playing {{champion:240}} .

replies.body: There is a 30 second cooldown between remount. I believe, we made some tweaks to how the cooldown is displayed in the next patch.

So, waiting until next patch, can you describe precisely how the cooldown is implemented, please ? :)

When does it start exactly? Can you stack Rage and just not mount or are you locked at 0 rage?
When he remounts, he will get a debuff for 30 seconds. During this 30 seconds, Kled dismounts, he will not be able to gain courage until the 30 seconds have fully passed.
I didnt know that. Thanks for clarifying
Is that cooldown lockout supposed to be live now. because too often that resource bar will fill up and he will remount in less that that time it feels like
It's 30 second since you last remounted. Look for the "Skaarl in a Brush" icon when you remount.

maybe a better one would be a 5 second lockout after dismounting to give people a proper chance to kill him after his free antiburst+anti cc he has from the dismount mechanic. I do recognize his statistic performance but I think this is simply a factor of learning curve for the champ personally but the ease and speed he can remount is simply frustrating to play against to the point that riot simply cannot give him any buffs to up his statistic performance since he would become broken because of the extreme protection he gets from the dismount.
